data.title: Wagle Ki Duniya: Nayi Peedhi Naye Kissey star Sumeet Raghavan gave a special treat to the entire team; ‘I whip up whatever the mood calls for’
data.meta_description: Sumeet is well-known for his portrayal of a young Sudama in Mahabharat in addition to playing Dr. Rajat in Sanjivani - A Medical Boon and Hudd Kar Di, Rishtey. In the popular sitcom 'Sarabhai vs. Sarabhai,' starring Satish Shah, Ratna Pathak Shah, Rupali Ganguly, and Rajesh Kumar, played the role of Dr. Sahil. | Tellychakkar.com
data.text:
MUMBAI : Actor Sumeet Raghavan has impressed his Wagle Ki Duniya: Nayi Peedhi Naye Kissey co-stars and crew members with impromptu delicacies with his cooking ability.

Sumeet plays Rajesh Wagle along with his fellow actors and workers on the sets and is beloved among his fans.

In his makeup room, he has set up an induction stove, so he can cook for the cast whenever the mood strikes.

Also read: Wagle Ki Duniya Nayi Peedhi Naye Kissey SPOILER: WHAT! Vandana expects Sakhi should write about her as her role model

Sumeet commented, "You can always find a kitchen setup on my makeup table. I genuinely enjoy cooking for my friends and colleagues, it's a way to share some warmth and fun. Most of the time, my cooking is a hit, though I’ll admit there have been a few rare misses."

"Pariva Pranati, Chinmayee Salvi, Bharati Achrekar, Harshad, and others often put in their requests. From French toast and omelettes to burgers, I whip up whatever the mood calls for. It's a joy to see their reactions and just have a little fun time off between the shoot," he added.

The drama centers on the typical middle-class family and offers a touching mix of emotional circumstances and realistic life lessons. Sony SAB streams 'Wagle Ki Duniya: Nayi Peedhi Naye Kissey.'

Sumeet is well-known for his portrayal of a young Sudama in Mahabharat in addition to playing Dr. Rajat in Sanjivani - A Medical Boon and Hudd Kar Di, Rishtey. In the popular sitcom 'Sarabhai vs. Sarabhai,' starring Satish Shah, Ratna Pathak Shah, Rupali Ganguly, and Rajesh Kumar, he played the role of Dr. Sahil.

Television shows that Sumeet has appeared in include Resham Dankh, Ghar Ki Baat Hai, Sajan Re Jhoot Mat Bolo, Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah, Ziddi Dil Maane Na, Badi Door Se Aaye Hain, and Pushpa Impossible.

Also read: Wagle Ki Duniya Nayi Peedhi Naye Kissey SPOILER: WHAT! Vandana expects Sakhi should write about her as her role model
